name: Dodgercity
description:
Epilepsy warning! – this game could cause epilepsy even if you didn't have it before.
Rage warning! – this game could be cause of some broken devices (mostly if you are  using a bucket instead of computer)

It is rageful, colorful and I lost its source, so I have to remake it again. Also there is only one level, because ... ehm ... Doesn't matter, just try it.

Controls are basic:

ADWS – Movement

Space - jump

E – down dash

Also you can jump by walls.
